items.text: too much width, slashed to deep point
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: right on top of the bounce as he fends this into the off side.
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Sumant Kumar: "Once upon a time, Shakib and dreruss were teammates." -- Only last year.
items.text: on the pads, tucked to fine leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: width outside off, crashed to backward point
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: squeezes this yorker-length delivery to cover.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: pulled, even though this kept a touch low. Down to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pulls a skiddy short delivery, but this races to the deep midwicket fence even with a heavy outfield. Rovman Powell did all the hard work in running to his right from deep square but just couldn't get down in time and pull this back in. Valiant effort.
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: pulled, but just short of Gayle at midwicket
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: miscues a pull, but this falls safe. Gayle running from midwicket towards square leg, never had a chance. Someone quicker may have just got there.
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: lovely square drive to deep point.
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: dabs this down to square third man for an easy single.
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on the pads, tucked to the man coming in from deep square
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: length on the stumps, dabbed into the off side for a quick single
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pulled again, not in control but down to deep square anyway
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: dabs this down to third man
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: right into the blockhole, honing in towards leg. He's off balance but manages to ham his bat down on time to keep that out
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: mistimes a pull towards fine leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: once again yorker length, squeezed into the off side for a single. Got this off a thick inside edge onto the boot.
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: third yorker in this over, this is sensational stuff. Tamim is extremely rushed for pace as he is once again off balance, slips as he manages to keep that out.
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText:
Jason Holder is back

zizi: "is it me or does the ball keep following Gayle around, maybe its also time for holder to return and try to end the partnership" -- Well, he listened to you. He'll bowl from around the stumps.
items.text: steps out but Holder cleverly adjusts his length as he angles this in, defended.
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the pads, flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: steered towards backward point
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: steps out and reaches out to toe-end this low full toss to mid-off
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: looking to sweep, misses. This lobbed off the pad towards short third man. He wasn't sure where the ball went, so was outside the crease. Fortunately for Shakib, the throw missed the stumps at the striker's end. Replays suggest there was some glove on this
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run
